title: The Dancing Dragon: A Halloween Novella
description: A sweet, no-spice romance with a bookstore owner on her way to a Halloween/D&D party, but she unknowingly falls through a portal and ends up in a fantasy realm! He's a fae who believes he's cursed to never find love...What follows is witty banter, adventure, mistaken identity, magic, & more!
author: A.R. Kaufer
